	public static void main(String[] args) {
		File file =new File("e:/a.txt");
		FileW(file);

	}
	public static void FileW (File file) {
		FileWriter fw =null;
		try {
			 fw = new FileWriter(file);
			 fw.write("Æ¤µ°");	
			/* byte[] bs={'a','3','e','w'};
			 for (byte b : bs) {
				 fw.write(b);
			}*/
			 fw.flush();
			 fw.close();
			
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
